name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes: **Note:** Impaired vocal cord mobility may be described as vocal cord paresis, and may suggest invasion of intrinsic laryngeal muscle. Fixation of the vocal cord maybe described as immobility of the arytenoids noted on endoscopy, paralysis of the vocal cords, or deviation of larynx to the fixed side.
footnotes:

\### Considered distant in Historic Stage
